sentences.en: Details of the accident are still sketchy .
sentences.cn: 事故的详细情况依然不完全。

sentences.en: Details of what actually happened are still sketchy.
sentences.cn: 对于已发生事实的详细情况知道的仍然有限。

sentences.en: He gave us a very sketchy account of his visit.
sentences.cn: 他跟我们非常粗略地讲了他参观的情况。

sentences.en: He only managed to give the police a few sketchy details of the robbery.
sentences.cn: 他只能向警方粗略地描述了抢劫的情况.

sentences.en: I don't like his personality because he's always so sketchy with things.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢他的个性.他对事情总是很有心机.

sentences.en: I have only a sketchy knowledge of geography.
sentences.cn: 我对地理只是一知半解.

sentences.en: Information about the crisis was sketchy and hard to get.
sentences.cn: 关于这次危机的消息所知甚少并且很难获得.

sentences.en: It was a sketchy version patched together with a lot of guesswork.
sentences.cn: 这是个七拼八凑的故事,其中还掺杂许多猜想.

sentences.en: Only sketchy information exists on the stock of natural resources such as fish.
sentences.cn: 人们对鱼类等自然资源的总储备量所知甚少。

sentences.en: Our information on Israeli intentions was sketchy.
sentences.cn: 我们得到的有关以色列意图的情报非常粗略.

sentences.en: She had been very sketchy in telling him much about herself.
sentences.cn: 关于她个人的情况,玛丽只是很简单说了一下.

sentences.en: The material he supplied is too sketchy.
sentences.cn: 他提供的材料过于简略.

sentences.en: The still sketchy theory of luminescence in solids and liquids cannot be discussed here in detail.
sentences.cn: 在此不能详细讨论目前还很粗糙的固体和液体的发光理论.

sentences.en: They had had only sketchy training.
sentences.cn: 他们只受过简单的训练.

sentences.en: We managed to piece together the truth from several sketchy accounts.
sentences.cn: 我们从几方面粗略的说法中设法弄清了真相.

sentences.en: Your essay gives a rather sketchy treatment of the problem.
sentences.cn: 你的文章只粗略地涉及到这个问题.

words.tran_cn: 写生风格的；写生的；概略的

trans.tran_cn: 概要的，粗略的，未完成的，写生风格的，速写的，略图似的
trans.tran_en: not thorough or complete, and not having enough details to be useful
